artist: Francesco Rosaspina; After Agostino Carracci; Guiseppe Asioli
description: Virgin Mary being carried to heaven by cherubs above center; below group of saint and apostles around open coffin
marks:

title: Marie Virgine Assunta in Cielo e ii Sante Apostoli intorno al di lei Sepolcro
